code: @Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     context.addService(new MyService("A", false)).     context.addService(new MyService("B", true)).     context.addService(new MyService("C", false)).     return context. }
@Test public void testStopWithFailure() throws Exception {     stopOrder = "".     context.stop().     assertEquals("CBA", stopOrder). }
public void stop() throws Exception {     stopOrder = stopOrder + name.     if (fail) {         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Fail " + name).     } }
